name: Aries
details: Aries is the first sign of the zodiac, known for being energetic and assertive.
characteristics: Energetic, assertive, dynamic, courageous, and competitive.

name: Taurus
details: Taurus is the second sign of the zodiac, known for being reliable and patient.
characteristics: Reliable, patient, practical, devoted, and responsible.

name: Gemini
details: Gemini is the third sign of the zodiac, known for being adaptable and outgoing.
characteristics: Adaptable, outgoing, intelligent, curious, and affectionate.

name: Cancer
details: Cancer is the fourth sign of the zodiac, known for being intuitive and caring.
characteristics: Intuitive, caring, loyal, emotional, and protective.

name: Leo
details: Leo is the fifth sign of the zodiac, known for being confident and charismatic.
characteristics: Confident, charismatic, generous, loyal, and enthusiastic.

name: Virgo
details: Virgo is the sixth sign of the zodiac, known for being analytical and meticulous.
characteristics: Analytical, meticulous, practical, reliable, and kind.

name: Libra
details: Libra is the seventh sign of the zodiac, known for being diplomatic and charming.
characteristics: Diplomatic, charming, fair-minded, social, and cooperative.

name: Scorpio
details: Scorpio is the eighth sign of the zodiac, known for being passionate and resourceful.
characteristics: Passionate, resourceful, brave, determined, and magnetic.

name: Sagittarius
details: Sagittarius is the ninth sign of the zodiac, known for being adventurous and optimistic.
characteristics: Adventurous, optimistic, independent, enthusiastic, and philosophical.

name: Capricorn
details: Capricorn is the tenth sign of the zodiac, known for being disciplined and ambitious.
characteristics: Disciplined, ambitious, responsible, practical, and resourceful.

name: Aquarius
details: Aquarius is the eleventh sign of the zodiac, known for being innovative and independent.
characteristics: Innovative, independent, humanitarian, intelligent, and unconventional.

name: Pisces
details: Pisces is the twelfth sign of the zodiac, known for being compassionate and artistic.
characteristics: Compassionate, artistic, intuitive, gentle, and wise.
